title: Illuminated Page (from a Psalter?), recto and verso
description: Double-sided; scrolling leaves and flowers; blue, gold, red, interspersed with many brilliant gold leaf dots; Design extends into points above and below text space; Paragraph spaces filled with pale fine black pen scrolls and blue dots; small gold-leaf initials in squares; expertised at the Morgan Library
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
